3 IMAGE

Base styles/objects. Mostly global, tag-based selector rules.

3.1 Base

Default styling of images

<img src="http://www.placehold.it/160x120"  />

3.2 Rounded

Applies slightly rounded edges to element.

<img src="http://www.placehold.it/160x120" class="img-rounded" />

3.3 Polaroid

Applies subtle default styling to define the image on the page. Use sparingly.

<img src="http://www.placehold.it/160x120" class="img-polaroid" />

3.4 Circle

Creates an entirely circular image. Works on images where width === height.

<img src="http://www.placehold.it/160x160" class="img-circle" />
Created using kss-node and kss-node-template.
